Definition: A statement of the ability and cooperation of the patient in taking medicine or supplement as recommended or prescribed. This includes correct timing, dosage, and frequency.
Condition(s):
ele-1:All FHIR elements must have a @value or children {children().count() > id.count()}
ext-1:Must have either extensions or value[x], not both {extension.exists() != value.exists()}

Definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
The frequency that the stated treatment plan, prescription, or protocol is followed.
Reason for not following the stated treatment plan, prescription, or protocol.
Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.

Short: identifies the meaning of the extension
Definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
